snippet.title: Hamster Inn Trailer
snippet.description:
Preorder Now! https://hyperbeard.com/game/hamster-inn/

Are you in for some HAMSpitality?

In this cute little management and care game you’ll be in charge of the Hamster Inn and all its cute, little guests. The rooms will need to be cleaned, the keys delivered, the food must be cooked and somebody’s gotta squeak’n do it!

MANAGE the Inn to ensure the satisfaction of all your furry and non furry guests.

MINGLE through the hotel to catch all the happenings in the rooms, be sure that everything flows smoothly.

SERVE amazing dishes to fill the bellies of your guests with joy.

CLEAN the rooms so the chilling can be done without a worry in mind.

We all need some time to chill and enjoy the luxuries of a pleasant resort, in Hamster Inn we encourage to be yourself at every time.
